languages.text: {n}Выпалив свою речь, дознаватель, кажется, выныривает из марева неразбавленной ненависти. Переведя дух, он смотрит на вас — теперь уже с выражением невыразимой усталости.{/n} "Идем же. Каждая минута в этом проклятом месте близит нас всех к безумию".

{n}After delivering his speech, Heinrix seems to snap out of his haze of undiluted hatred. He takes a breath and glances at you, now looking weary beyond words.{/n} "Come on. Every minute in this cursed place brings us all closer to madness."
languages.original_text: {n}Выпалив свою речь, дознаватель, кажется, выныривает из марева неразбавленной ненависти. Переведя дух, он смотрит на вас — теперь уже с выражением невыразимой усталости.{/n} "Идем же. Каждая минута в этом проклятом месте близит нас всех к безумию".

traits.locale_text: {n}After delivering his speech, Heinrix seems to snap out of his haze of undiluted hatred. He takes a breath and glances at you, now looking weary beyond words.{/n} "Come on. Every minute in this cursed place brings us all closer to madness."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}己の主張を語り終え、ハインリックスは憎悪だけで作られたもやから抜け出したようだ。息を吸ってあなたをみつめるその顔には、言い表せない疲労感が漂っている。{/n}「くそっ。こんな忌々しい場所にいると、刻一刻と正気が失われていくな」
languages.original_text: {n}After delivering his speech, Heinrix seems to snap out of his haze of undiluted hatred. He takes a breath and glances at you, now looking weary beyond words.{/n} "Come on. Every minute in this cursed place brings us all closer to madness."

traits.locale_text: {n}己の主張を語り終え、ハインリックスは憎悪だけで作られたもやから抜け出したようだ。息を吸ってあなたをみつめるその顔には、言い表せない疲労感が漂っている。{/n}「くそっ。こんな忌々しい場所にいると、刻一刻と正気が失われていくな」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}说完这番话后，海因里希似乎从无法化解的仇恨阴霾中暂时清醒过来了。他深吸了一口气，注视着你，疲惫之意溢于言表。{/n}“快走吧。在这个诅咒之地待得越久，我们就会变得越是疯狂。”
languages.original_text: {n}After delivering his speech, Heinrix seems to snap out of his haze of undiluted hatred. He takes a breath and glances at you, now looking weary beyond words.{/n} "Come on. Every minute in this cursed place brings us all closer to madness."

traits.locale_text: {n}说完这番话后，海因里希似乎从无法化解的仇恨阴霾中暂时清醒过来了。他深吸了一口气，注视着你，疲惫之意溢于言表。{/n}“快走吧。在这个诅咒之地待得越久，我们就会变得越是疯狂。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Une fois son discours achevé, Heinrix semble sortir de son accès de haine aveugle. Il prend une inspiration et le regard qu'il vous lance est chargé de toute la fatigue du monde.{/n} « Venez. Chaque minute que nous passons dans cet endroit maudit nous rapproche de la folie. »
languages.original_text: {n}After delivering his speech, Heinrix seems to snap out of his haze of undiluted hatred. He takes a breath and glances at you, now looking weary beyond words.{/n} "Come on. Every minute in this cursed place brings us all closer to madness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une fois son discours achevé, Heinrix semble sortir de son accès de haine aveugle. Il prend une inspiration et le regard qu'il vous lance est chargé de toute la fatigue du monde.{/n} « Venez. Chaque minute que nous passons dans cet endroit maudit nous rapproche de la folie. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tras pronunciar su discurso, Heinrix parece salir de su nube de pensamientos oscuros. Respira hondo y te mira con un aspecto de cansancio indescriptible.{/n} «Vamos. Cada minuto en este lugar maldito nos pone más al borde de la locura».
languages.original_text: {n}After delivering his speech, Heinrix seems to snap out of his haze of undiluted hatred. He takes a breath and glances at you, now looking weary beyond words.{/n} "Come on. Every minute in this cursed place brings us all closer to madness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras pronunciar su discurso, Heinrix parece salir de su nube de pensamientos oscuros. Respira hondo y te mira con un aspecto de cansancio indescriptible.{/n} «Vamos. Cada minuto en este lugar maldito nos pone más al borde de la locura».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Nach seiner Ansprache scheint Heinrix seinen Anflug von Hass überwunden zu haben. Er atmet durch und blickt dich argwöhnisch an.{/n} "Kommt. Jede Minute an diesem verfluchten Ort bringt uns dem Wahnsinn näher."
languages.original_text: {n}After delivering his speech, Heinrix seems to snap out of his haze of undiluted hatred. He takes a breath and glances at you, now looking weary beyond words.{/n} "Come on. Every minute in this cursed place brings us all closer to madness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach seiner Ansprache scheint Heinrix seinen Anflug von Hass überwunden zu haben. Er atmet durch und blickt dich argwöhnisch an.{/n} "Kommt. Jede Minute an diesem verfluchten Ort bringt uns dem Wahnsinn näher."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Lafını bitiren Heinrix, zihnini bulandıran katıksız nefretten kurtulmuşa benziyor. Soluklanıp göz ucuyla sana bakıyor. Kelimelerle ifade edilemeyecek kadar bitkin duruyor.{/n} "Gidelim. Bu lanetli yerde geçirdiğimiz her saniye bizi deliliğe sürüklüyor."
languages.original_text: {n}After delivering his speech, Heinrix seems to snap out of his haze of undiluted hatred. He takes a breath and glances at you, now looking weary beyond words.{/n} "Come on. Every minute in this cursed place brings us all closer to madness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Lafı bitince Heinrix zihnini bulandıran katıksız nefretten kurtuluyor gibi. Soluklanıp göz ucuyla sana bakıyor. Kelimelerle ifade edilemeyecek kadar bitkin duruyor.{/n} "Gidelim. Bu lanetli yerde geçirdiğimiz her saniye bizi deliliğe sürüklüyor."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
